Another spelling of eph.ron (עֶפְרוֹן "(Mount )Ephron" H6085H)
§ This name is used for:
1) sea
1a) Mediterranean Sea
1b) Red Sea
1c) Dead Sea
1d) Sea of Galilee
1e) sea (general)
1f) mighty river (Nile)
1g) the sea (the great basin in the temple court)
1h) seaward, west, westward
